subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Related to {{och-l|觜|horn-like hair on the owl-head; beak of a bird; mouth}}.

Further etymology is unknown. {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} relates it to {{cog|bo|མཚུལ་པ||lower part of the face; muzzle; beak}}, which is from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*m-ts(j)ul||lip; beak}} ({{zh-ref|STEDT}}).
